body:
Let's take a nice trip back down Memory Lane and remember the old Avicus times.

I am curious to see what people remember.

For example, I remember prestiges and me getting first prestige. What about you guys? c;
body_tagged:
Let's take a nice trip back down Memory Lane and remember the old Avicus times.

I am curious to see what people remember.

For example, I remember prestiges and me getting first prestige. What about you guys? c;
title: Remember When...?

replies.body:
When the Director rank was a thing.

When the Junior Mod rank was Cyan and not that disgusting purple. 

When we had 750 players regularly on the server.

When 250 players on the server was considered low (now it's considered high :( 

When the staff ranks' colours changed;
(Mod went from Blue to Light red)
(Sr mod went from light red to dark red)
etc.

When the Resistance thing was a thing.

When the Nightclub was just an 18+ channel.

When Teamspeak was chill and wasn't so strictly ran, and it was casually ran by the Admins.
(Now we have teamspeak developers and other ranks that really don't need to be a thing) 

When the community didn't spend every waking second worrying about what the staff are doing.

When you had who killed you and who you killed the most on your profile as a top 10 list.

When the seniors weren't so preoccupied on rules and policies and just made sure other staff were pulling their weight.

(Now we have teamspeak developers and other ranks that really don't need to be a thing) 

When the community didn't spend every waking second worrying about what the staff are doing.

When you had who killed you and who you killed the most on your profile as a top 10 list.

When the seniors weren't so preoccupied on rules and policies and just made sure other staff were pulling their weight.

replies.body_tagged: old ts community ;(

replies.body:
Oh boy I remember a lot.

Let's see here xD

-When I first joined McZone breaking all the monuments on my own team's side (I was a noob).

-Joining Fancy Soldiers Clan (OP AF team xd). Led by the great MustardMan227 and Corkscrew12

-Creating Berzerk and all the versions that followed it... plus the salt fest Omega Championship. "ProfessorUtonium has destroyed cave."

-Changing my name to PeachyYas lmao

-The flat kid op elimination prestige

-THE PVP TEAM AND JANNERBOY THE LEGEND.

-Geor and his love of becoming mapdev.

-Jozz's 'Fluenza' love affair...

-A wild Flat (Fouled)

-#Charmy Build Team

-Iz and CC's romance, the original AviLove (before Petlas and whatever Zero and Cat's ship is).

-All the FrostedCupcakez shippings 

-A wild Keenan! Actually playing Walls! (sorta)

-The Minechat moderating by a certain staff member. 

-RCMP_Mountie coming back and getting staff, a living legend

-All the ex staff members.

-PlugDJ crew and events

-The Resistance

-When maps were actually decent

-Mr. Dick Penis getting mod

-All the attacks on Avicus...

-Nexus and CTH days (god those were fun)

-Original walls

replies.body: Nexus
replies.body_tagged: Nexus

replies.body:
Fort

Manager

Green Quintus

A shit ton of players

The old, wonderful ts

Kill farms in Quintus

The Jr. rank when I first got it was cyan

Michael interviewing me in the most monotone voice ever lol

The hub with the little spawn island suspended in the middle

Back when the staff team was really close and friendly (Not that it isn't now, it was just better back then.)

The old Zac

Speaking of Zac, him Aero, Tynvale, Vo, Pav, nintendo, Evo, Ky, and Petlas (Snowlas btw) in the BEST batch ever

A lot more I forgot, but a ton of great times.

Speaking of Zac, him Aero, Tynvale, Vo, Pav, nintendo, Evo, Ky, and Petlas (Snowlas btw) in the BEST batch ever

A lot more I forgot, but a ton of great times.

replies.body:
When you joined the server and just went straight to a walls game.

Voting to get kit Guardian

Charmy build team (still got the skin lmao). 
(anyone remember the epic LOTR map we made that never got accepted???)

Skywars. OUR skywars, not the new fancy version on Hypixel. Old skywars was best skywars. #BringBackSkywars

Playing against legends like vGuap and armoredpotato on walls, and knewing I was gunna lose.

The secret room in the sandstone lobby. :o (benesth the floor)


There's probably a ton more but I'm too lazy to list them all.

replies.body:
Old avicus, best avicus

But dude, I remember the Howsie, Detty, Gill, Dustin and Andy days... the best
yoav, koo in the sistahood group

I rememeber when I was promoted to admin... it was in a staff meeting and some of the sr mods told me I was going to be promoted (manager was a thing back then and I skipped that rank). It was all silent and only Gill was talking, and I heard my name; it was a strange feeling lol. Gill, you're one of - if not - the best admin I worked with. You taught me so much when I was admin, even though it was indirect. Whenever there was a situation you amended it very well; and I observed that!

The director rank... Dark blue tags for mods
replies.body_tagged:
Old avicus, best avicus

But dude, I remember the Howsie, Detty, Gill, Dustin and Andy days... the best
yoav, koo in the sistahood group

I rememeber when I was promoted to admin... it was in a staff meeting and some of the sr mods told me I was going to be promoted (manager was a thing back then and I skipped that rank). It was all silent and only Gill was talking, and I heard my name; it was a strange feeling lol. Gill, you're one of - if not - the best admin I worked with. You taught me so much when I was admin, even though it was indirect. Whenever there was a situation you amended it very well; and I observed that!

The director rank... Dark blue tags for mods

replies.body:
MC Zone

Skywars!

Zaildoor my fav

When people trolled and spawnkilled (Idk if it was punishable then though xD)

When I came back and joined the forums

There's a lot more, we'll see if I'll write more later :)

Update:

At Venomus TDM you could take the axe at the end of the map to the next map, got so many people scream "Hacker!" then x)

Snowball fight at Zaildoor

When a person had very much kb and knocked me from one ironfarm to the other one on Senex I

When I started and didn't know how to crouch and tried to bridge xD

My Lovely sneaky ways I did when I started and couldn't PVP :)

replies.body: I remember scrim servers
replies.body_tagged: I remember scrim servers

replies.body:
Buying most of the Nexus kits on MCZone

Zalidor, Venomous, Broken World and Decay <3

Having 3rd all time on Cth under bbman and BossTurtle way back when avi was new (last i checked i was like 14th rip)

Nexus getting removed and then re-added cause all the hate

People buying steak for their whole team because memes 

All the old Nexus players and maps 

Getting 3 prestige's in Nexus on the same map (New Heaven)

Getting to level 49 on Cth but never getting 1st prestige cause they got removed :(

When all i did on nebula was bowspam cause i was bad

Saying hi to everyone that looked cool cause im a loser that has no friends xd

When you got items from Kills on Cth

Pointshop thingy on neb

Applying for staff a long time ago when i learned about the forums and denied cause i capitalized every word Xd

When you could just shift and go through the spawn protection and stuff

When i was a nice person and a god with a bow  

BALLZI, Thecalined and BOSS_Turtle98

When splade (ithink) got the spanky spade for the whole team xdd

replies.body: Remember when I was the onext who made Geor spam the forums
replies.body_tagged: Remember when I was the onext who made Geor spam the forums

reply_to.body:
Oh boy I remember a lot.

Let's see here xD

-When I first joined McZone breaking all the monuments on my own team's side (I was a noob).

-Joining Fancy Soldiers Clan (OP AF team xd). Led by the great MustardMan227 and Corkscrew12

-Creating Berzerk and all the versions that followed it... plus the salt fest Omega Championship. "ProfessorUtonium has destroyed cave."

-Changing my name to PeachyYas lmao

-The flat kid op elimination prestige

-THE PVP TEAM AND JANNERBOY THE LEGEND.

-Geor and his love of becoming mapdev.

-Jozz's 'Fluenza' love affair...

-A wild Flat (Fouled)

-#Charmy Build Team

-Iz and CC's romance, the original AviLove (before Petlas and whatever Zero and Cat's ship is).

-All the FrostedCupcakez shippings 

-A wild Keenan! Actually playing Walls! (sorta)

-The Minechat moderating by a certain staff member. 

-RCMP_Mountie coming back and getting staff, a living legend

-All the ex staff members.

-PlugDJ crew and events

-The Resistance

-When maps were actually decent

-Mr. Dick Penis getting mod

-All the attacks on Avicus...

-Nexus and CTH days (god those were fun)

-Original walls

-Original walls
